doc://com.apple.applesearchads/documenta.title: Apple Search Ads Campaign Management API 4

abstract.text: Drive app discovery by creating and managing campaigns with the Apple Search Ads Campaign Management API.
The assignment of a creative to an ad group.
The request to create an ad, and assign a creative to an ad group.
The response to ad group requests.
The response to a request that returns a list of ads.
The response to an ad request.
The status of whether the ad is serving.
The user-controlled status of the ad.
The request to update an ad.
The list of condition objects that allow users to filter a list of records.

The creative object.
The type of creative.
The defined targeted audience to include by device type.

The response to a request to fetch ad-level reports.
The selector objects available to filter returned data.
Updates an ad in an ad group.
